Divine Ascent.name: Divine Ascent
Divine Ascent.description: Innate: Upon reaching levels 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending another skill point, Kayle ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.
Divine Ascent.description2: Innate - Zealous: At level 1, Kayle's basic attacks grant  6% bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of 30% bonus attack speed. At maximum stacks, Kayle becomes Exalted, gaining  8% bonus movement speed.
Divine Ascent.description3: Innate - Arisen: At level 6, Kayle becomes a  ranged champion with  525 attack range.
Divine Ascent.description4: Innate - Aflame: At level 11, while Exalted, Kayle's basic attacks against non-structures additionally launch a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing 15 − 35 (based on  Starfire Spellblade's Rank) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)  magic damage to enemies hit. The waves are affected by  critical strike modifiers.
Divine Ascent.description5: Innate - Transcendent: At level 16, Zealous is permanently set to maximum stacks and Kayle gains  50 bonus attack range, for a total of 575 attack range.
Divine Ascent.notes:
* The  bonus magic damage applies  proc damage and the additional waves deal  area damage.
 Zealous can stack against structures.
 If Kayle is in her attack animation after the stacks finish she gains another 0.5 seconds to refresh / stack Zealous.
 The waves apply spell effects.
 The waves and passive stacks do not benefit from  Runaan's Hurricane and  Guinsoo's Rageblade's innate passives.
 Because Kayle is considered both a  melee and  ranged champion, she can buy items for both types at any point in the game without being restricted.
 The innate effects of melee/ranged items will not function until Kayle becomes either type.

 Kayle will attack as if she were melee while within  175 attack range of her target even after becoming Arisen, this does not occur after she is Aflame.
 This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e  Runaan's Hurricane).
 This will still not trigger the activation of melee effects (i.e  Ravenous Hydra).

 Upon becoming Aflame, Kayle's portrait changes:
 Classic:  becomes .
 Silver Kayle:  becomes .
 Viridian Kayle:  becomes .
 Battleborn Kayle:  becomes .
 Aether Wing Kayle:  becomes .
 Riot Kayle:  becomes .
 Pentakill Kayle:  becomes .
  Transcended Kayle,  Judgment Kayle, and  Iron Inquisitor Kayle do not change their portraits.

Radiant Blast.name: Radiant Blast
Radiant Blast.description: Active: Kayle plants a portal at her initial location that faces the target direction. After a 0.25-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from the portal.
Radiant Blast.description2: The sword explodes into a cross upon collision with an enemy, dealing magic damage and  slowing targets struck, while reducing their  armor and  magic resistance by 15% for 4 seconds.
Radiant Blast.description3: Radiant Blast refunds  50% of its mana cost for each enemy champion hit.
Radiant Blast.notes:
* The VFX of the cross that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword.
 Despite the VFX suggesting otherwise, the two sides of the guard are each as long as the blade in terms of collision: approximately 295 units. PENDING FOR TEST

Celestial Blessing.name: Celestial Blessing
Celestial Blessing.description: Active: Kayle and target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Celestial Blessing.description2: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest ally in range, prioritizing the most wounded one.
Celestial Blessing.notes: * The ability's effects apply instantly but Kayle will remain in cast time for 0.25 seconds.

Starfire Spellblade.name: Starfire Spellblade
Starfire Spellblade.description: Passive: Kayle's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Additionally,  Aflame's base damage is increased.
Starfire Spellblade.description2: Active: Kayle's next basic attack within 6 seconds deals bonus magic damage. After unlocking  Aflame, the attack explodes, damaging and applying on-hit effects to all enemies around the target.
Starfire Spellblade.description3: Prior to becoming  Arisen, Starfire Spellblade also causes Kayle to become a  ranged champion with 525 attack range on the empowered attack.
Starfire Spellblade.description4: Starfire Spellblade resets Kayle's basic attack timer.
Starfire Spellblade.notes:
* Starfire Spellblade's active applies both on-hit and spell effects.
 Before becoming  Arisen, when attacking below 175 range, Starfire Spellblade's active is considered a  melee attack (i.e. it will trigger  Tiamat).
 After unlocking Aflame, the exploding attack will only trigger the  Cleave and Crescent passives on the primary target, unlike all other on-hit effects.

 Kayle's target essentially takes double damage from her innate if they do not avoid the fiery wave, as the on-hit damage and wave damage will stack.

Divine Judgement.name: Divine Judgement
Divine Judgement.description: Active: Kayle refreshes  Zealous and grants the target allied champion or herself  invulnerability for a few seconds.
Divine Judgement.description2: Kayle also begins conjuring swords around herself and highlights an area around her target for 1.5 seconds. At the end of the channel, the swords rain down and deal magic damage to all enemies within the area around her target.
Divine Judgement.description3: Divine Judgement will prioritize casting on allies over Kayle.
Divine Judgement.notes:
* The aura around the target does not appear if the target is not  visible to the enemies' point of view.
 The  mana expenditure only occurs after the  cast time, though Kayle requires at least 100 mana to begin the cast. 
 The ability will still go off if Kayle has less than the required mana at the time of expenditure (for effects such as  Seraph's Embrace's).

 Once cast has begun, the second part of the ability will go off regardless of whether or not Kayle or her target are alive.
 The prioritization will also cause Divine Judgement to be able to target allied decoys.
